version_description:
• Online games synchronization bug fixed
• 7 new ball designs
• Snooker rules updated
• Several minor bug fixes

• Online games synchronization bug fixed
• 7 new ball designs
• Snooker rules updated
• Several minor bug fixes

• Critical update - incompatible with earlier versions for online games
• Computer concedes in Snooker
• Fixed freezing issue in Crokinole
• Improved iPhone 4 stability
• Fixed rare issue where balls intersect
• New ball design
• Several minor bug fixes

• Critical update - incompatible with earlier versions for online games
• Computer concedes in Snooker
• Fixed freezing issue in Crokinole
• Improved iPhone 4 stability
• Fixed rare issue where balls intersect
• New ball design
• Several minor bug fixes

• New Scenery
• 3-Ball Pool included
• AI concede option in Settings
• Other improvements and bug fixes

• 3-Ball Pool included
• AI concede option in Settings
• Other improvements and bug fixes

• includes the much requested "Recent Games" feature
• Compatible with iOS 8
• Updated for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
• Other bug fixes and improvements

• includes the much requested "Recent Games" feature
• Compatible with iOS 8
• Updated for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
• Other bug fixes and improvements

• User Interface overhaul
• Game Center - leaderboards and achievements
• Undo/Redo in solo games
• Replay option in solo and vs AI games
• New pool ball textures and table spots
• Background Music
• Native 64-bit support
• Snooker 147 break now possible vs AI
• General improvements and bug fixes

• User Interface overhaul
• Game Center - leaderboards and achievements
• Undo/Redo in solo games
• Replay option in solo and vs AI games
• New pool ball textures and table spots
• Background Music
• Native 64-bit support
• Snooker 147 break now possible vs AI
• General improvements and bug fixes

• Updated UI
• Fixed online sync issues
• Other minor UI improvements
• Stability improvements
• Remember, ball textures, table colors and scenery can be changed right from the game screen

• Updated UI
• Fixed online sync issues
• Other minor UI improvements
• Stability improvements
• Remember, ball textures, table colors and scenery can be changed right from the game screen

• Ability to hide Replay button (Display Settings)
• New Classic and Transparent modes for game buttons (General Settings)
• New Classic and Transparent modes for score panes (General Settings)
• Dynamic and Custom UI color schemes (General Settings)
• Updated App Icon
• Other minor improvements and fixes

• Ability to hide Replay button (Display Settings)
• New Classic and Transparent modes for game buttons (General Settings)
• New Classic and Transparent modes for score panes (General Settings)
• Dynamic and Custom UI color schemes (General Settings)
• Updated App Icon
• Other minor improvements and fixes

Winning shot replay
Fixes issue with Table spots
Fixes issue with rotation on older devices
Stability improvements

Winning shot replay
Fixes issue with Table spots
Fixes issue with rotation on older devices
Stability improvements
Fixes intermittent crash that happens when switching ball textures.
Fixes intermittent crash that happens when switching ball textures.

• Circular tables added for Pool and Snooker
• New Game: Karambol - Carrom Billiards with no cushion requirements
• Place-n-Shoot mode for pocketless billiards games
• Fixed cue stick responsiveness in iOS 10
(For best results, align shot, drag stick back slightly, then flick forward to shoot)
• Fixed color ball spotting rules in Snooker
• Other minor improvements and stability fixes

• Circular tables added for Pool and Snooker
• New Game: Karambol - Carrom Billiards with no cushion requirements
• Place-n-Shoot mode for pocketless billiards games
• Fixed cue stick responsiveness in iOS 10
(For best results, align shot, drag stick back slightly, then flick forward to shoot)
• Fixed color ball spotting rules in Snooker
• Other minor improvements and stability fixes

• Cue stick textures
• Option to match opponents with identical aiming lines
• Chat window fixes
• Stability improvements
• Fixed ball going through rail in Circular Pool games

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.
